title: AveragingCalculationMethodEnum
description: Specifies enumerations for the type of averaging calculation.

oneOf.title: Arithmetic
oneOf.description: Refers to the calculation of an average by taking the sum of observations divided by the count of observations.

oneOf.title: Geometric
oneOf.description: Refers to the calculation of an average by taking the nth root of the product of n observations.

oneOf.title: Harmonic
oneOf.description: Refers to the calculation of an average by taking the reciprocal of the arithmetic mean of the reciprocals of the observations.
